author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
We continue to get bug reports for Windows PowerShell 5.1.  Updating the readme will provide clarity to users on the difference particularly in relation to this repo.

Fixed semantic linefeeds in first paragraph.

<!--

If you are a PowerShell Team member, please make sure you choose the Reviewer(s) and Assignee for your PR.
If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

-->

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Markdown test failed in AppVeyor CI build:
```
Describing Common Tests - Validate Markdown Files
NPM is checking Gulp is installed. This may take a few moments.
C:\projects\powershell\README.md: 4: MD013 Line length
See https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/blob/master/doc/Rules.md for an 
explination of the error codes.
 [-] Should not have errors in any markdown files 19.52s
   Expected: {0}
   But was:  {1}
   at line: 120 in 
C:\projects\powershell\test\common\markdown\markdown.tests.ps
```

title: Added section explaining Windows PowerShell vs PowerShell Core
